Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)


Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back.
Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience.
BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite
Mesh Cover
NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.
JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.
IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.
MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.
BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.

Samsonite’s Ultimate Support for your Lower Back

This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home

This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car

Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite’s High-Grade Memory Foam

Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort

This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

4.5
Price: $29.99 - $19.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:41 UTC – Details)

item.description: Price: (as of – Details) The PetSafe healthy pet water and food station is the ﬁrst gravity food system with a removable-stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. Simply sanitize the stainless steel bowl at high temperatures in your dishwasher to eliminate potential bacteria that can cause your pet harmful ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $27.99 - $19.95
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:27:35 UTC – Details)


The PetSafe healthy pet water and food station is the ﬁrst gravity food system with a removable-stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and is dishwasher safe. Simply sanitize the stainless steel bowl at high temperatures in your dishwasher to eliminate potential bacteria that can cause your pet harmful infections from micro-organisms, allergic reactions or skin and nose irritations. The coordinating PetSafe healthy pet food station and healthy pet water station are designed to complement most home decor. Space-saving footprints and modern style are ideal for kitchens, laundry rooms, garages and other indoor areas. Sold separately is the healthy pet water filter to remove chlorine, sediments and odor from your pet’s drinking water. Water A: small- .5 gallon. The activated carbon filter removes bad tastes and odors from the water and catches large particles and debris from re-circulating back into the water. The filters do not purify the water. Change them every 2-4 weeks, depending on how many pets use the fountain, to keep the fountain water fresh and clean.
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.8 x 6.5 x 10.5 inches; 1.1 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PFD17-11854
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ September 1, 2009
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Radio Systems Corporation
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B002RT8M84
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

DRINK ANY TIME: This gravity water station allows you to keep your pet hydrated at all times of the day or night
STURDY CONSTRUCTION: The reservoir is made of durable plastic and locks in place to help from knock over and spills
HYGIENIC WATER BOWL: The bowl is stainless steel and more hygienic for your pet
EASY-TO-CLEAN: Disassembles for easy cleaning; stainless steel bowl is dishwasher safe
U.S.-BASED CUSTOMER CARE: Our pet product experts are here to help you and your pet and are available by phone, email or chat if you have any questions
ESTABLISHED EXPERIENCE: PetSafe brand has been a trusted global leader in pet behavior, containment and lifestyle innovations for nearly 30 years. We help pets and their people LIVE HAPPY TOGETHER


Read more


Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

The PetSafe Healthy Pet Food and Water Stations are the first gravity food and water systems with a removable stainless steel bowl that is easy to clean and dishwasher safe. The food station works great for weekend trips as well as everyday use for the busy pet parent.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Read more

Healthy Pet Lifestyle




Matching Set

Pair your Water Station with a PetSafe Healthy Pet Food Station.

Multiple Sizes to Choose From

Choose the perfect size to match your pets needs. A constant supply of water means your pet can stay hydrated at all times of the day and night.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

Read more




Easy to Clean

Top rack dishwasher-safe stainless steel bowl

Safe Material

All parts are made with durable plastic and stainless steel

Filtered Water

Activated carbon filter keeps your pet’s water clean and fresh-tasting (filters not included).

Read more

More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet PetSafe Healthy Pet Carbon Filters help keep your pet’s water fresh. The PetSafe Drinkwell Pet Fountain Cleaning Kit makes it easy and convenient to clean your pet fountain. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet’s feeding schedule through the smartphone app-enabled feeder. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Let your furry friends come and go with the PetSafe Electronic SmartDoor. Easily program your pet’s entry and exit with the automatic setting. The Bolt is a fun interactive laser toy. The Bolt offers both an automatic mode which generates random patters and a manual mode where you control the action.

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:14:38 UTC – Details)

Product Description

ATOPNUC Mini PC, Powerful & Professional Mini computers.

ATOPNUC Mini computers comes with Windows 11 Pro installed.

Why choose ATOPNUC Mini PC?

-Small size only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inches, ideal portable mobile office computer.-8th Gen Intel Core i5-8279U up to 4.1Ghz, power processing multiple task.-Pre-installed Windows 11 Pro operation system, also supports Ubuntu & Linux.-16GB DDR4 & 512GB SSD, large compacity ensure running multi-tabs no lagging, don’t slow down the operation drastically, flexible expansion: RAM to 32GB maximum, SSD to 1TB maximum.-Dual 4K screen display. support connect with two 4k@30Ghz screen for multiple task handling at the same time.-Multi-Ports more function, 4 x USB 3.0 ports, 1 x USB-C, 2 x HDMI ports, 1 x Gigabit Ethernet port, 1 x Micro SD Card port, 1 x Headphone Microphone Port.-Strong wireless 2.5Ghz+5G dual band WiFi5, 1000 Mb/s Gigabit Ethernet + bluetooth 5.0, Keyboard/Mouse connected works flawlessly.-Quiet Fan work silent, doesn’t overheat. the fan beneath the mini pc. high performance heat dissipation for the hardware.

The feature of ATOPNUC Mini desktop PC:

Specification of ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Processor Intel Coffee Lake i5 8279U (6M Cache, up to 4.1 GHz) Graphics Intel Iris Plus Graphics 655 (300 MHz-1.15GHz, support 4K@60Hz) Memory 16GB, Dual-channel DDR4-2400, support DIY up to 32GB Storage 512GB (M.2 PCIE 2280 SSD), support install 1*2.5″ SATA HDD (7 mm), up to 2 TB Operating System Windows 11 Pro , also support Ubuntu & Linux Wireless Connectivity Bluetooth 5.0 & 2.5G+ 5G Dual-Band Wi-Fi Video Output 2* HDMI (4K@30Hz) Audio Output HDMI, Display Port, 3.5mm Audio Jack Gigabit Ethernet 1000Mbps LAN Power Adapter Automatics Voltage adjustment between 100 and 240V AC,50/60Hz, 65Watts(19V/3.42A) VESA Mount Included Kensington Lock Yes Interface 4*USB 3.0 ports， 1* Type-C ports, 2* HDMI port, 1* Gigabit Ethernet Port, 1* TF card reader

Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors

The Mini pc comes with Intel 8th Gen Core i5-8279U Professors with 4 cores & 8 threads. base operating frequency is 2.40 GHz/s rising to a 4.10 GHz in burst mode.

Large Expandable Storage

The mini desktop computer comes with 16GB DDRS RAM expandable to 32GB maximum and 512GB NVME SSD supports 2.5 inch SSD or HDD expandable 2TB storage capacity (not included)) to expand storage.

Dual 4K@30Hz HDMI Ports

the mini desktop PC equipped with 2 HDMI ports supports 4K@30Hz dual screen display, running the 4K UHD video smooth without any issues.

High performance heat dissipation

This small form factor PC has a user-friendly and intimate design. Fan and heat sink dual boost, cooling the Mini PC when the PC runs the heavy job but a trade-off to keep the PC running efficiently without any issue.

Mini size & Power performance

The mini computers is only 4.94*4.41*2.05 inch, portable design, you can carry it anywhere, perfect mobile office pc for business. even the small pc size but the performance is powerful, parallelly used multi-tabs without any issue and playing multiple web browsing and video windows together definitely works as well.

Easy to Installation with VESA mount

The micro desktop computer shipped with VESA mount, easy to install the PC on the wall or back of the monitor or TV. saving space and convenient carry the PC to anywhere while business trips.

Multiple Application MINI PC

FAQ of the ATOPNUC Mini PC:

Q1: is the Windows 11 Pro already installed?

A: Yes, ATOPNUC mini pc comes with Windows 11 Pro pre-installed. no need activation key.feel free to use other operating system, such as Linux, Ubuntu…

Q2: How to enter BIOS?

A: turn on the portable mini computers firstly. press and hold the ” F2 ” key until enter the BIOS.

Q3: Can i change the operation system?

A:Yes, you can change the operation to Windows 10 or Ubuntu, Linux and others by yourself or contact with us to get the update file.

Q4: How can i enable multi-screen?

A: The small pc comes with dual 4K@30Hz HDMI ports can be extended to connect to two monitors, allowing you to handle multi-task at the same time.

Q5: Is the copact pc noisy when running?

A: To cool the machine’s hardware, ATOPNUC Mini PC only produces about 30 decibels of fan sound when fully loaded. Most of the time it’s within the normal range. silent fan and high performance for the cooling.

Kindly Notes:

Please read the User Manual carefully before using the ATOPNUC Mini PC to learn more about it.

Any questions please feel free to let us know at the first time before you use or need update the software.

Our Type-C port only data transfer, please kindly note it.

(as of Nov 30,2022 05:09:30 UTC – Details)

From the brand

Givebest has always been keeping itself on edge in same category of household appliance, and committing its users to bring home the best service and products, especially the heaters which sharing us the warmth and hope.

Winning the popular reputation from 600,000+ families worldwide, we will strive to keep polishing our brand and providing affordable and quality products to appreciate our loyal users.

GiveBest Tower Heater

GiveBest Portable Heater

GiveBest Electric Fireplace

2 in 1 heater fan: This ceramic heater provides two heat levels, 1500W or 750W and one cool air fan, you can use it both for winter and summer. Thermostat control of the heater will turn the heater off when it reaches a preset temperature and turn the heater back on when the temperature dips below the thermostat setting
Multi protection safety system: These heaters are made of flame retardant material avoiding any fire hazard. Automatic safety shutoff system will shut the heater off when the heater overheat. The tip over protection system will also shut the heater off when the heater was knocked over by accident and it will come back on automatically if it is up righted
Compact and powerful: 7.9 inch x 6.2 inch x 10.2 inch, 2.9 pounds portable mini heater with build in carry handle helps to reinforce the potential of rather low electrical bills by using at the place where you need when you don’t want to warm the full house with other centralized heaters
Quiet and fast heating: The noise this ceramic heater makes is lower than 45 decibels, quiet enough for most people to use in a bedroom while sleeping. With PTC ceramic heating tech and high speed fan, this heater put out tons of heat to heat up 200 square feet in seconds
Upgrade abs material: Upgrade abs material applied, which is more flame-retardant. The room heater with six feet lead cord and 2 prong connection has a long lasting life

Previous page
Next page

1 Quick Heat 2 Low Noise 3 Safe to Use

Is it a noisy heater?

Everyone's sensitivity to sound is different. The noise level of our heater is 45 dB . A suitable living environment should not exceed 55 dB and should not fall below 15 dB:)

Can I use the heater in the bathroom?

You can use the heater to heat your bathroom, but a heater is an electric appliance, it need to be kept away from water.

Does this heater is efficient and cost-effective?

Yes, this heater is a 1500w heater, so it is very efficient, the heating effect is the same as other heaters, but compared with other heaters, this heater is more cost-effective.

How do I choose a heater? From outlook or safe features or others ?

Absolutely safety first. A heater must have overheat and tip over protection.

I need a heater for my pet. Does this heater release chemicals such as PTFE?

No, our heaters don't release chemicals, it is safe for pets.

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash? Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags! We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $9.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:02:42 UTC – Details)


HEAVY-DUTY BAGS DESIGNED WITH MOTHER NATURE IN MIND

Looking for heavy-duty dog poop bags that don’t easily break?

Smarter waste bags that you can confidently toss in the trash?

Then you’ll love our new and improved doggy bags!

We went back to the drawing board and created extra-strong leak-proof bags made using a
special ingredient. The secret behind this smart technology? A certified additive known as d2w.
It shortens the life of our bags at the end of its useful life when it ends up in the open
environment.

So you get to throw your pet’s waste without destroying the environment.

Here are more reasons you’ll love these strong poop bags:

  • – Made with 15 microns-thick plastic for greater strength.
  • – Well-sealed seams prevent the bags from ripping.

– The opaque design masks the contents of the bags.- Scented with a jasmine fragrance that keeps odor at bay.- Very easy to separate from the roll thanks to high-quality perforations.- Sized at 13” (L) x 9” (H) to handle poop from all breeds.- They leave you enough room at the top to create a knot.- Backed by a 100.

Go ahead, get heavy-duty biodegradable poop bags that you can toss guilt-free!
Is Discontinued By Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ No
Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 6.97 x 5.12 x 2.76 inches; 1.19 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PH-240T
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 8, 2016
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B01HIM19HK
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Environmentally Friendly Degradable Plastic – Our pet waste bags are infused with a D2W additives which helps them break down more quickly than traditional plastics, which makes them more eco-friendly if they do reach a landfill
Quick Cleanup Made Easy – Our versatile doggy poop bags are thicker, more durable, and feature easy-tear perforations to make it easier to pull a single one away from the roll. This means less time standing around and more time cleaning up
Supports Small to Large Breed Dogs – These degradable dog poop bags are 13” x 9” in size which make it easier to pick up and safely store messy feces and deposits for all types of breeds, including chihuahuas to boxers to Labradors
Trusted Quality Assurance – Here at Best Pet Supplies we make pet poop bags and pet accessories that support owners and their four-legged friends. If you have any questions, please reach out and we’ll provide fast, reliable support

Read more

Lightly Scented

Our doggie poop bags are lightly scented to help mask those smelly odors. This is especially important if you need to walk some distance before you find a trash can or have to keep it in the car until you get home.

Fun Colors & Patterns

Who said poop bags have to be totally gross? We offer doggie poop bags in a variety of pet and owner-friendly colors including pink hearts, cute paws, bones and much more!

Thicker & Resilient Bags

Standard poop bags often tear or leak, especially if you have a larger dog. We’ve made our plastic bags 15 microns thick to withstand those late-night poop walks, dog park excited poops and all the other messy situations a pet owner winds up in.

Easy-Tear Perforations

Every bag is cleanly perforated and easy to tear off from the roll. The opaque design masks the contents of the bags. Try our dog waste bag dispensers to keep them on hand when it is needed!

Read more

From the brand

PetLab Co. Products

How did we get our start?

PetLab Co. was formed with a simple mission: to provide comfort and support for pets.

What makes our products unique?

If an ingredient is not beneficial then you won’t find it in our products. We work alongside experts to ensure that each ingredient is purposeful and up to our high standards.

Why do we love what we do?

Motivated by results and happy customers, we have created products that make a difference in both owners’ and pets’ lives. Producing delicious, simple, and effective supplements to support a healthy and active life.

EASY TO APPLY: This paw soother balm comes in an easy-to-use twist stick, so you can quickly apply it to your pup’s paws before and after walks
MOISTURIZING DOG PAW BALM: In addition to soothing and moisturizing, this paw wax can also support your dog’s paws by providing a barrier from internal and external irritants
WORKS ALL YEAR LONG: Our dog paw moisturizer is ideal for both summer months, when paw licking can be at its height, and winter months, when paw dryness is more common
POWERFUL INGREDIENTS: Thanks to its natural ingredients like organic shea butter and coconut oil, this dog paw balm is not only beneficial, but it’s also gentle

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $199.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:23:59 UTC – Details)

From the brand

It’s not just a device stand… it’s freedom to move about your abode. That freedom can be compromised if your device stand wobbles. or can’t extend over your furniture. LEVO’s aluminum tubing and brawny joints create a structure that is sturdy to minimize wobbling. All developed by our team, these components are used throughout our LEVO line. All this greatness is backed by over 22 years of supreme manufacturer care. LEVO – Elevate your lifestyle!

LEVO for Your Tablet

Laptop Workstations

LEVO for Hospitals B07X2PXM4T

Brings the world to patientsUL Listed for use in hospitalsIncludes USB-C charging port.

ROBUST CONSTRUCTION FOR RESIDENTIAL OR COMMERCIAL USE. Sit, recline, or lie in bed and LEVO will securely hold your tablet at the perfect height and viewing angle. Flip lever height locks and 5 axis articulating swing arm for quick positioning. Simply grab the platform then swing tilt and spin it into perfect view. No clearance needed under your furniture. Includes 2 inch wheels for smooth rolling. Patented.
SUPER STURDY CONSTRUCTION minimizes annoying bouncing while surfing or typing, and protects your valuable device from tipping over. Swing-arm quickly swings and folds when not in use, or to exit your furniture. Quickly swings back in place at the exact same height and angle so you can continue surfing in deluxe style anytime.
EXTENDS 24 INCHES to the center of your device. Quickly spins from portrait to landscape so you can view your pages or photos at their best. Height adjusts from 30-56 inches (nice range) measured from floor to center of device.
INTERCHANGEABLE PLATFORMS so you can quickly switch from electronic devices to books and magazines (book platform sold separately – search B00GIJ20O6). Compatible with all iPads including 12.9 iPad Pro, Galaxy tablets, Surface, Zoom, Nexus, Nook, Fire, and other tablets and eReaders with length from 5.25 to 13.5 inches (including case), and weighing up to 4 pounds. Attach and remove your device in seconds.
LUSTROUS ANODIZED ALUMINUM finish looks fabulous in your home or office. Gunmetal color with black accents. 3-year warranty.




BOOK PLATFORM KIT
LEVO Utility Basket
Optional Accessories Platforms on this LEVO are quickly interchangeable. With our optional Book Platform Kit, you can swith from reading your tablet to reading books, magazines, cookbooks, sheet music and more. Add stowage space to your LEVO Floor Stand. Stow your stuff such as tablets, batteries, eye glasses, notebooks, headphones, medical equipment, books, or just about anything else! Except liquids… of course.
